t: J&J Snack Foods | JJSF Stock Price, Company Overview & News
s: J&J Snack Foods Corp. manufactures nutritional snack foods and distributes frozen beverages. It also distributes snack foods to the food service and retail supermarket industries. The company operates in three business segments: Food Service, Retail Supermarkets and Frozen Beverages.

t: J&J Snack Foods - Wikipedia
s: March 11, 2025 - J&J Snack Foods Corp. (JJSFC) is an American manufacturer, marketer, and distributor of name brand snack foods and frozen beverages. Headquartered in Mt. Laurel, NJ, JJSF uses over 175 facilities for manufacturing, warehousing, and distributing located in 44 states, Mexico, and Canada.
